column4: <OerHeks> That's what i've been trying to do... But im inexperienced in the area and am having issues with dependacy's...
Before building it yourself (whatever "it" is; not been paying enough attention) have you checked if there's a PPA for it?
I've not been able to get GetDeb to work for quite some time.  I keep getting 403 Forbiddens on the repo.  Not sure, sorry, just thought I'd check if you'd tried for PPAs.
Neither.  It just updates the available-packages information.  You need to follow it with a "sudo apt-get upgrade" to actually install the updates.
